verses.verse: אִמְר֥וּ <WH559> Say לַאֲחֵיכֶ֖ם <WH251> ye unto your brethren עַמִּ֑י <WH5971> Ammi וְלַאֲחֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH269> and to your sisters רֻחָֽמָה׃ <WH7355> Ruhamah

רִ֤יבוּ <WH7378> Plead בְאִמְּכֶם֙ <WH517> with your mother רִ֔יבוּ <WH7378> plead כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִיא֙ <WH1931> he לֹ֣א <WH3808> is not אִשְׁתִּ֔י <WH802> for she [is] not my wife וְאָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I לֹ֣א <WH3808> am not אִישָׁ֑הּ <WH376> neither [am] I her husband וְתָסֵ֤ר <WH5493> let her therefore put away זְנוּנֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH2183> her whoredoms מִפָּנֶ֔יה <WH6440> out of her sight וְנַאֲפוּפֶ֖יהָ <WH5005> and her adulteries מִבֵּ֥ין <WH996> between שָׁדֶֽיהָ׃ <WH7699> from between her breasts

פֶּן־ <WH6435> Or אַפְשִׁיטֶ֣נָּה <WH6584> Lest I strip עֲרֻמָּ֔ה <WH6174> her naked וְהִ֨צַּגְתִּ֔יהָ <WH3322> and set כְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> her as in the day הִוָּֽלְדָ֑הּ <WH3205> that she was born וְשַׂמְתִּ֣יהָ <WH7760> and make כַמִּדְבָּ֗ר <WH4057> her as a wilderness וְשַׁתִּ֙הָ֙ <WH7896> and set כְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> land צִיָּ֔ה <WH6723> her like a dry וַהֲמִתִּ֖יהָ <WH4191> and slay בַּצָּמָֽא׃ <WH6772> her with thirst

וְאֶת־ <WH853> בָּנֶ֖יהָ <WH1121> upon her children לֹ֣א <WH3808> no אֲרַחֵ֑ם <WH7355> And I will not have mercy כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because בְנֵ֥י <WH1121> for they [be] the children זְנוּנִ֖ים <WH2183> of whoredoms הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> like

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for זָֽנְתָה֙ <WH2181> hath played the harlot אִמָּ֔ם <WH517> For their mother הֹבִ֖ישָׁה <WH3001> them hath done shamefully הֽוֹרָתָ֑ם <WH2029> she that conceived כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָמְרָ֗ה <WH559> for she said אֵלְכָ֞ה <WH1980> will go אַחֲרֵ֤י <WH310> after מְאַהֲבַי֙ <WH157> my lovers נֹתְנֵ֤י <WH5414> that give לַחְמִי֙ <WH3899> [me] my bread וּמֵימַ֔י <WH4325> and my water צַמְרִ֣י <WH6785> my wool וּפִשְׁתִּ֔י <WH6593> and my flax שַׁמְנִ֖י <WH8081> mine oil וְשִׁקּוּיָֽי׃ <WH8250> and my drink

לָכֵ֛ן <WH3651> Therefore הִנְנִי־ <WH2005> behold שָׂ֥ךְ <WH7753> Therefore behold I will hedge אֶת־ <WH853> דַּרְכֵּ֖ךְ <WH1870> up thy way בַּסִּירִ֑ים <WH5518> with thorns וְגָֽדַרְתִּי֙ <WH1443> and make אֶת־ <WH853> גְּדֵרָ֔הּ <WH1448> wall וּנְתִיבוֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH5410> her paths לֹ֥א <WH3808> cannot תִמְצָֽא׃ <WH4672> that she shall not find

וְרִדְּפָ֤ה <WH7291> And she shall follow אֶת־ <WH853> מְאַהֲבֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH157> after her lovers וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> she will not תַשִּׂ֣יג <WH5381> but she shall not overtake אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> וּבִקְשָׁ֖תַם <WH1245> them and she shall seek וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> but will not תִמְצָ֑א <WH4672> them but shall not find וְאָמְרָ֗ה <WH559> [them] then shall she say אֵלְכָ֤ה <WH1980> will go וְאָשׁ֙וּבָה֙ <WH7725> and return אֶל־ <WH413> about אִישִׁ֣י <WH376> husband הָֽרִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> to my first כִּ֣י <WH3588> it was ט֥וֹב <WH2896> for then [was it] better לִ֛י אָ֖ז <WH227> then מֵעָֽתָּה׃ <WH6258> with me than now

וְהִיא֙ <WH1931> he לֹ֣א <WH3808> does not יָֽדְעָ֔ה <WH3045> For she did not know כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> who נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> that I gave לָ֔הּ הַדָּגָ֖ן <WH1715> her corn וְהַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <WH8492> and wine וְהַיִּצְהָ֑ר <WH3323> and oil וְכֶ֨סֶף <WH3701> her silver הִרְבֵּ֥יתִי <WH7235> and multiplied לָ֛הּ וְזָהָ֖ב <WH2091> and gold עָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> [which] they prepared לַבָּֽעַל׃ <WH1168> for Baal

לָכֵ֣ן <WH3651> Therefore אָשׁ֔וּב <WH7725> Therefore will I return וְלָקַחְתִּ֤י <WH3947> and take away דְגָנִי֙ <WH1715> my corn בְּעִתּ֔וֹ <WH6256> in the time וְתִירוֹשִׁ֖י <WH8492> thereof and my wine בְּמֽוֹעֲד֑וֹ <WH4150> in the season וְהִצַּלְתִּי֙ <WH5337> thereof and will recover צַמְרִ֣י <WH6785> my wool וּפִשְׁתִּ֔י <WH6593> and my flax לְכַסּ֖וֹת <WH3680> [given] to cover אֶת־ <WH853> עֶרְוָתָֽהּ׃ <WH6172> her nakedness

וְעַתָּ֛ה <WH6258> and then אֲגַלֶּ֥ה <WH1540> And now will I discover אֶת־ <WH853> נַבְלֻתָ֖הּ <WH5040> her lewdness לְעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight מְאַהֲבֶ֑יהָ <WH157> of her lovers וְאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> and none לֹֽא־ <WH3808> and no יַצִּילֶ֥נָּה <WH5337> shall deliver מִיָּדִֽי׃ <WH3027> her out of mine hand

וְהִשְׁבַּתִּי֙ <WH7673> to cease כָּל־ <WH3605> to all מְשׂוֹשָׂ֔הּ <WH4885> I will also cause all her mirth חַגָּ֖הּ <WH2282> her feast days חָדְשָׁ֣הּ <WH2320> her new moons וְשַׁבַּתָּ֑הּ <WH7676> and her sabbaths וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and all מוֹעֲדָֽהּ׃ <WH4150> and all her solemn feasts

וַהֲשִׁמֹּתִ֗י <WH8074> And I will destroy גַּפְנָהּ֙ <WH1612> her vines וּתְאֵ֣נָתָ֔הּ <WH8384> and her fig trees אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> of which אָמְרָ֗ה <WH559> whereof she hath said אֶתְנָ֥ה <WH866> These [are] my rewards הֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> These לִ֔י אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> Which נָֽתְנוּ־ <WH5414> have given לִ֖י מְאַֽהֲבָ֑י <WH157> that my lovers וְשַׂמְתִּ֣ים <WH7760> me and I will make לְיַ֔עַר <WH3293> them a forest וַאֲכָלָ֖תַם <WH398> shall eat חַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> and the beasts הַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> of the field

וּפָקַדְתִּ֣י <WH6485> And I will visit עָלֶ֗יהָ <WH5921> and אֶת־ <WH853> יְמֵ֤י <WH3117> upon her the days הַבְּעָלִים֙ <WH1168> of Baalim אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> When תַּקְטִ֣יר <WH6999> wherein she burned incense לָהֶ֔ם <WH1992> to them וַתַּ֤עַד <WH5710> to them and she decked נִזְמָהּ֙ <WH5141> herself with her earrings וְחֶלְיָתָ֔הּ <WH2484> and her jewels וַתֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> along אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after מְאַהֲבֶ֑יהָ <WH157> her lovers וְאֹתִ֥י <WH853> שָׁכְחָ֖ה <WH7911> and forgat נְאֻם־ <WH5002> me saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD פ

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I מְפַתֶּ֔יהָ <WH6601> Therefore behold I will allure וְהֹֽלַכְתִּ֖יהָ <WH1980> her Bring הַמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> her into the wilderness וְדִבַּרְתִּ֖י <WH1696> and speak עַל־ <WH5921> and לִבָּֽהּ׃ <WH3820> comfortably

וְנָתַ֨תִּי <WH5414> And I will give לָ֤הּ אֶת־ <WH853> כְּרָמֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH3754> her her vineyards מִשָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> there וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> from thence and the valley עָכ֖וֹר <WH5911> of Achor לְפֶ֣תַח <WH6607> for a door תִּקְוָ֑ה <WH8615> of hope וְעָ֤נְתָה <WH6030> and she shall sing שָּׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> there כִּימֵ֣י <WH3117> there as in the days נְעוּרֶ֔יהָ <WH5271> of her youth וִּכְי֖וֹם <WH3117> and as in the day עֲלֹתָ֥הּ <WH5927> when she came up מֵאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt ס

וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> will come בַיּוֹם־ <WH3117> And it shall be at that day הַהוּא֙ <WH1931> he נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD תִּקְרְאִ֖י <WH7121> [that] thou shalt call אִישִׁ֑י <WH376> me Ishi וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and will no תִקְרְאִי־ <WH7121> and shalt call לִ֥י ע֖וֹד <WH5750> longer בַּעְלִֽי׃ <WH1180> me no more Baali

וַהֲסִרֹתִ֛י <WH5493> For I will take away אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֥וֹת <WH8034> the names הַבְּעָלִ֖ים <WH1168> of Baalim מִפִּ֑יהָ <WH6310> out of her mouth וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יִזָּכְר֥וּ <WH2142> and they shall no more be remembered ע֖וֹד <WH5750> more בִּשְׁמָֽם׃ <WH8034> by their name

וְכָרַתִּ֨י <WH3772> will I make לָהֶ֤ם בְּרִית֙ <WH1285> a covenant בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he עִם־ <WH5973> with חַיַּ֤ת <WH2416> for them with the beasts הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <WH7704> of the field וְעִם־ <WH5973> with ע֣וֹף <WH5775> and with the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven וְרֶ֖מֶשׂ <WH7431> and [with] the creeping things הָֽאֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> of the ground וְקֶ֨שֶׁת <WH7198> the bow וְחֶ֤רֶב <WH2719> and the sword וּמִלְחָמָה֙ <WH4421> and the battle אֶשְׁבּ֣וֹר <WH7665> and I will break מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> out of the earth וְהִשְׁכַּבְתִּ֖ים <WH7901> and will make them to lie down לָבֶֽטַח׃ <WH983> safely

וְאֵרַשְׂתִּ֥יךְ <WH781> And I will betroth לִ֖י לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> thee unto me for ever וְאֵרַשְׂתִּ֥יךְ <WH781> yea I will betroth לִי֙ בְּצֶ֣דֶק <WH6664> thee unto me in righteousness וּבְמִשְׁפָּ֔ט <WH4941> and in judgment וּבְחֶ֖סֶד <WH2617> and in lovingkindness וּֽבְרַחֲמִֽים׃ <WH7356> and in mercies
וְאֵרַשְׂתִּ֥יךְ <WH781> I will even betroth לִ֖י בֶּאֱמוּנָ֑ה <WH530> thee unto me in faithfulness וְיָדַ֖עַתְּ <WH3045> and thou shalt know אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> I אֶֽעֱנֶה֙ <WH6030> I will hear נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶעֱנֶ֖ה <WH6030> I will hear אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> the heavens וְהֵ֖ם <WH1992> and they יַעֲנ֥וּ <WH6030> and they shall hear אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

וְהָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> And the earth תַּעֲנֶ֔ה <WH6030> shall hear אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּגָ֖ן <WH1715> the corn וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <WH8492> and the wine וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיִּצְהָ֑ר <WH3323> and the oil וְהֵ֖ם <WH1992> and they יַעֲנ֥וּ <WH6030> and they shall hear אֶֽת־ <WH853> יִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <WH3157> Jezreel

וּזְרַעְתִּ֤יהָ <WH2232> And I will sow לִּי֙ בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> her unto me in the earth וְרִֽחַמְתִּ֖י <WH7355> and I will have mercy אֶת־ <WH853> לֹ֣א <WH3808> not רֻחָ֑מָה <WH7355> compassion וְאָמַרְתִּ֤י <WH559> and I will say לְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> were not עַמִּי֙ <WH5971> to [them which were] not my people עַמִּי־ <WH5971> Thou [art] my people אַ֔תָּה <WH859> you וְה֖וּא <WH1931> and I יֹאמַ֥ר <WH559> and they shall say אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> [Thou art] my God פ
